text: Styx is a 2018 German-Austrian drama film directed by Wolfgang Fischer. It was screened in the Panorama section at the 68th Berlin International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Susanne Wolff as Rieke * Gedion Wekesa Oduor as Kingsley * Alexander Beyer as Paul * Inga Birkenfeld as Marie == Reception == === Critical response === On review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, the film holds an approval rating of 95% based on 19 reviews, with an average rating of 7.69/10. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:2018 films Category:2018 drama films Category:German films Category:German drama films Category:English-language films
title: Styx (film)
